pages.text: The Lunar Crystal makes its wearer immune to Levitation. By default, hitting a mob has a 10% chance to inflict Levitation III to the target for 3 seconds. This curio can (rarely) be found in end city chests.
The Lunar Crystal supports the following enchantments:$(br2)$(l)Feather Falling$(): Fall damage is reduced slightly per level (stacks with boots)
